volumeInfo.subtitle: Foundations of Program Design
volumeInfo.description: For almost a decade, Java Software Solutions has been the worldwide best-selling textbook for introduction to programming using the Java language. This text is renowned for providing a solid foundation in programming techniques that leads to well-designed object-oriented software. The authors' emphasis on building solid problem solving and solid design skills is bolstered by their integration of a multitude of small and large realistic programming examples.
volumeInfo.title: Java Software Solutions
